item.description:
Come join us for a cozy evening around the fire to watch the movie
Spirit of Albion featuring Damh the Bard's songs. Read more about what started out as a live musical below:

http://www.thespiritofalbionthemovie.com/background

We will be starting out with a pot luck dinner
(list to be sent out a week prior to the meet up on the list)
and then we will be sitting down in front of the fire to watch the
movie.

Please wear your comfy clothes, bring a preferably homemade pot luck dish, and bring you own booze.

This will be a limited meet up, as it is at my home which is small and can only contain a small number of people!
item.name: Pagan Movie Night- Spirit of Albion
